availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Daviess County, Kentucky, miller. Kentucky native. Married to M. Lashbrooks Pursell. Father of Sarah A. Pursell. Miller in Daviess County, Kentucky, in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Daviess County, District 2, p. 836.
Kentucky Birth, Marriage and Death Records (1852-1910), KDLA, Frankfort, KY, Roll 994033, Daviess County Births, p. 7.
"Lindsey Pursell (1831-1902)," Find A Grave, Memorial 11206919, accessed November 17, 2023, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/11206919.
